Thank you.
All of us on the staff are sincerely
looking forward to your next visit.

use_stop.msg:
We're sorry. Service is temporarily unavailable.
Please wait a moment.

finish_mode_0.msg:
The time limit for this course has expired.
Service will now switch to the regular menu.
Please be aware that regular prices will be charged for each order.

finish_mode_1.msg: Availability of the course menu ends now.

order_lock_text.msg:
Your order has been processed successfully.
Thank you for dining with us.
Please note that items pending order will be deleted.
We are preparing items for which orders have been processed.
Please wait. They will be served shortly.

order_value_alert.msg:
A large number of items has been selected.
Please check the selected items to confirm whether an error has been made.

order_cancel.msg:
Your item selections will be deleted.
Proceed?

alcohol_check.msg:
The selected items include alcoholic beverages.
Minors and guests who will be driving should refrain from consuming these items.
Proceed with your order?

order_complete.msg:
Your order has been processed.
Thank you.

food_order_stop.msg:
No further orders for food items can be taken at this time.
Drink orders will continue to be accepted.
We have received your previous orders.
Please wait a moment for them to be served.

drink_order_stop.msg:
No further drink orders can be taken at this time.
Orders for food items will continue to be accepted.
We have received your previous orders.
Please wait a moment for them to be served.

order_stop.msg:
Thank you for dining with us today.
Please take your tabulated bill to the register.
Come back soon. We look forward to your next visit.
Have you left anything behind?

staffcall_confirm.msg: A staff member will be called. Proceed?

staffcalling.msg: A staff member is being called. Please wait a moment.

staffcall_complete.msg: A staff member will come to your seat. Please wait a moment.

staffcall_error.msg: We were unable to receive your request.

accountingcall_complete.msg:
Thank you for dining with us today.
Please take your tabulated bill to the register.Come back soon.
We look forward to your next visit.
Have you left anything behind?

accountingcall_error.msg: We were unable to receive your request.

max_value_total.msg:
The item selection limit for this order has been reached.
Please touch the "Order" button to place your order.

max_panel_value_total.msg:
A product of the choice is full.
I touch an order button, and, please order it.

max_value_subtotal.msg:
The number of items selected has exceeded the maximum.
Please complete this order, then start a new one.
We regret the inconvenience.

max_value_subtotal_select.msg:
No additional selections of this item can be made.
Please complete this order, then start a new one.

check_person_001.msg: There is a limit on ○○ of one per person per order.

check_person_002.msg: ○○ orders are limited to △△ servings of each variety per order.

check_person_003.msg: ○○ orders are limited to □□ items per person per order.

check_person_004.msg: There is a limit on ○○ of one item per person.

check_person_005.msg: There is a limit on ○○ of □□ items per party.

check_person_006.msg: ○○ orders are limited to one item per order.

check_person_007.msg:
For course menu orders,
there is a limit of one per person of any given item per order.

check_person_008.msg: For ○○ orders, please be sure to order one per person.

check_person_009.msg: ○○ orders are limited to ○○ servings of any given variety per order.

check_person_010.msg:
For this item selection,
please be sure to order □□ items.

update_mst_notice.msg:
We're sorry.
Service is temporarily unavailable.
Please wait a moment.

billboard_error.msg: We're sorry. Service is temporarily unavailable. Please wait a moment.

battery_alert.msg:
The battery is low!Please check the power cord.
Please ask the staff for assistance if you cannot find the power cord.

battery_timeup.msg: Please place the device on the charger.

wifi_update.msg:
Preparing the menu now.
Please wait a moment.

number_input_notfound.msg:
Product not found.
Please check the product number entered.

number_input_nohandle.msg: Selected product is no longer avaiable.

number_input_stop.msg: Orders are no longer being taken for the day.

cart_stockout_item.msg:
ご選択中の以下の商品が品切れとなりました。
ご了承ください。
%item%

1000.msg: All staff are currently busy processing other orders. Please touch the "Return" button. We apologize for the inconvenience.

1002.msg:
We were unable to receive your order.
Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again.
We apologize for the inconvenience.

1003.msg:
We were unable to receive your order.
Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again.
We apologize for the inconvenience.

1004.msg:
We were unable to receive your order.
Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again.
We apologize for the inconvenience.

1005.msg: Your item selections include items that are sold out. Touch the "Return" button to delete items that are sold out. Please place your order again.

1006.msg:
We were unable to receive your order.
Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again.
We apologize for the inconvenience.

1007.msg:
An error has occurred with your item selections,
and the order cannot be accepted. Please call for a staff member. We apologize for the inconvenience. Touch the "Return" button to delete items associated with the error.

1008.msg:
An error has occurred with your item selections.
Please touch the "Return" button. We apologize for the inconvenience.

1009.msg:
We were unable to receive your order for the item(s) below. Please call for a staff member.
We apologize for the inconvenience. An order has been received for an item not on the list. Touch the "Return" button to delete this item selection.

1100.msg: We were unable to receive your order because all staff were busy processing other orders. Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again. We apologize for the inconvenience.

1101.msg:
Your order seems not to have been completed correctly.
Please touch the "Return" button to confirm your current tabulated bill. We apologize for the inconvenience.

1102.msg:
We were unable to receive your order because all staff were busy processing other orders.
Please touch the "Return" button and place your order again. We apologize for the inconvenience.

3001.msg:
A processing error has occurred.
Please touch the "Return" button. We apologize for the inconvenience.
